trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs"></xref> class.

When implementing a source for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, pass in `true` for `previousModeAutoSized` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> already had an automatic resizing mode and the new mode is different.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 소스를 구현 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트 전달 `true` 에 대 한 `previousModeAutoSized` 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>이미 한 자동 크기 조정 모드 및 새로운 모드는 다릅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>
그렇지 않으면 전달 `false` 에 대 한 `previousModeAutoSized`합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성으로 설정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> 이외의 값 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성으로 설정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> 이외의 값 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> was previously set to automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> 자동으로 조정 이전에 설정 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> class is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, so this property relates specifically to the previous state of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs>클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트,이 속성의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 의 이전 상태에 특별히 관계가 있으므로</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> 및</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> 함께 사용 됩니다</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성으로 설정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> 이외의 값 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"> </xref> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 속성으로 설정 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> 이외의 값 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref> 또는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
